page.text: Wearing his newly created hat, Henry hurried home through the hustle and bustle of the city.
page.texthtml: Wearing his newly created hat, Henry hurried home through the hustle and bustle of the city.

page.text: He got a lot of funny looks because of the 'greenbeanie' on his head, but he didn't mind and he smiled at everyone.
page.texthtml: He got a lot of funny looks because of the 'greenbeanie' on his head, but he didn't mind and he smiled at everyone.

page.text: Yes, it was a bit unusual, all green and fitted, but what made it so incredible was the most marvelous little tree on top. He really liked wearing it, but especially today, the day of the big wilderness adventure!
page.texthtml: Yes, it was a bit unusual, all green and fitted, but what made it so incredible was the most marvelous little tree on top. He really liked wearing it, but especially today, the day of the big wilderness adventure!

page.text: Although it was early morning, there were lots of noises. The sounds from the streets thundered....voices, cars, and construction surrounded him.
page.texthtml: Although it was early morning, there were lots of noises. The sounds from the streets thundered....voices, cars, and construction surrounded him.

page.text: Henry quickened his pace.
page.texthtml: Henry quickened his pace.

page.text: When Henry arrived home, CeCe was waiting for him
page.texthtml: When Henry arrived home, CeCe was waiting for him

page.text: "Will you wear the greenbeanie I made for you?" he asked.
page.texthtml: "Will you wear the greenbeanie I made for you?" he asked.

page.text: "Yes," she answered grinning, as she placed the hat on her head and whispered, "I think it is magical."
page.texthtml: "Yes," she answered grinning, as she placed the hat on her head and whispered, "I think it is magical."

page.text: They picked up their backpacks and started to say goodbye to their little home
page.texthtml: They picked up their backpacks and started to say goodbye to their little home.

page.text: "Wait," said CeCe, "we can't forget Miss Matilda."
page.texthtml: "Wait," said CeCe, "we can't forget Miss Matilda."

page.text: Placing the cat comfortably in her backpack
page.texthtml: Placing the cat comfortably in her backpack

page.text: they made their way to the neighborhood bus stop.
page.texthtml: they made their way to the neighborhood bus stop.

page.text: As they rode the bus,the city seemed to blur by them like a movie on fast forward. The last stop came quickly.
page.texthtml: As they rode the bus,the city seemed to blur by them like a movie on fast forward. The last stop came quickly.

page.text: They waved goodbye to the bus driver, as they turned and walked to the busy marina.
page.texthtml: They waved goodbye to the bus driver, as they turned and walked to the busy marina.

page.text: Henry, CeCe, and Miss Matilda waited at the dock for the boat that would take them across the bay and out of the city.
page.texthtml: Henry, CeCe, and Miss Matilda waited at the dock for the boat that would take them across the bay and out of the city.

page.text: As it approached, the ferry horn blasted, and startled all three of them.
page.texthtml: As it approached, the ferry horn blasted, and startled all three of them.

page.text: While still on the dock, there was a huge gust of wind. WHOOSH!!!!! It blew Henry's greenbeanie away. "Oh No!" they both cried out.
page.texthtml: While still on the dock, there was a huge gust of wind. WHOOSH!!!!! It blew Henry's greenbeanie away. "Oh No!" they both cried out.

page.text: Luckily, the wind swept his hat back around and somehow, almost magically, he caught it!
page.texthtml: Luckily, the wind swept his hat back around and somehow, almost magically, he caught it!

page.text: After that, they both held their hats closely for the ride across the waves.
page.texthtml: After that, they both held their hats closely for the ride across the waves.

page.text: Miss Matilda disappeared down deep within the backpack. Water, wind and boats did not mix well with her. She was definitely an unhappy cat!
page.texthtml: Miss Matilda disappeared down deep within the backpack. Water, wind and boats did not mix well with her. She was definitely an unhappy cat!

page.text: When they had reached land, their hats were snugly on again.
page.texthtml: When they had reached land, their hats were snugly on again.

page.text: They stopped to eat the lunch they had packed.
page.texthtml: They stopped to eat the lunch they had packed.

page.text: Miss Matilda lapped up her yogurt, but kept her green eyes focused on the nearby screeching seagulls.
page.texthtml: Miss Matilda lapped up her yogurt, but kept her green eyes focused on the nearby screeching seagulls.

page.text: After a while, rested and with their bellies full, they traveled on.
page.texthtml: After a while, rested and with their bellies full, they traveled on.

page.text: From her watchful perch in CeCe's backpack, Miss Matilda was surprised to see a yellow dog following them. Ugh! A Dog!
page.texthtml: From her watchful perch in CeCe's backpack, Miss Matilda was surprised to see a yellow dog following them. Ugh! A Dog!

page.text: They walked for many more miles along a dirt road and before long, Miss Matilda has fallen asleep.
page.texthtml: They walked for many more miles along a dirt road and before long, Miss Matilda has fallen asleep.

page.text: She was startled awake from her cat nap by CeCe who was jumping up and down with excitement!
page.texthtml: She was startled awake from her cat nap by CeCe who was jumping up and down with excitement!

page.text: There it was finally! At the end of the path was a wooded wonderland, the fantastic fabulous forest!
page.texthtml: There it was finally! At the end of the path was a wooded wonderland, the fantastic fabulous forest!

page.text: They followed a wide pine needle trail that slowly became smaller and smaller until it vanished under their feet. Miss Matilda was upset by the way the branches scratched her ears and whiskers. She meowed loudly.
page.texthtml: They followed a wide pine needle trail that slowly became smaller and smaller until it vanished under their feet. Miss Matilda was upset by the way the branches scratched her ears and whiskers. She meowed loudly.

page.text: Surrounded by bushes and tree limbs,it was like being in a sea of greenery.
page.texthtml: Surrounded by bushes and tree limbs,it was like being in a sea of greenery.

page.text: They wondered which way to go?
page.texthtml: They wondered which way to go?

page.text: With a sudden sense of knowing,Henry and CeCe pushed through the growth
page.texthtml: With a sudden sense of knowing, Henry and CeCe pushed through the growth

page.text: and stumbled onto a gorgeous grove. It was amazing! It was a place with beautiful flowering bushes, a crooked little creek and a dazzling waterfall sparkling in the last sun rays of the day.
page.texthtml: and stumbled onto a gorgeous grove. It was amazing! It was a place with beautiful flowering bushes, a crooked little creek and a dazzling waterfall sparkling in the last sun rays of the day.

page.text: Before the moon had risen in the sky, they had built a cozy campfire and finished their dinner. Feeling very happy and very tired, they climbed into their sleeping bags. They knew that this enchanted place would be their new home! The forest sounds sang their lullaby to them.
page.texthtml: Before the moon had risen in the sky, they had built a cozy campfire and finished their dinner. Feeling very happy and very tired, they climbed into their sleeping bags. They knew that this enchanted place would be their new home! The forest sounds sang their lullaby to them.

page.text: Soon they were asleep, except of course for Miss Matilda. She needed to keep an eye on things.
page.texthtml: Soon they were asleep, except of course for Miss Matilda. She needed to keep an eye on things.
